category.4: Riverdi IoT Display 5" Capacitive BT815 uxTouch (Black)

https://www.robotshop.com/en/riverdi-iot.product: Riverdi IoT Display 5" Capacitive BT815 uxTouch (Black)

highlight.0: Riverdi IoT Display 5" Capacitive BT815 uxTouch (Black)
highlight.1: Provides 800 x 480 resolution for crisp and clear colors
highlight.2: Uses the powerful BT815 graphics controller
highlight.3: Is perfect for smart homes and industry 4.0
highlight.4: Is Python programmable, with integrated WiFi and Bluetooth

description: The Riverdi IoT Display 5" Capacitive BT815 uxTouch (Black) is the first-ever IoT display on the market. A high-quality 5’’capacitive screen Riverdi display that is Python programmable, with integrated WiFi and Bluetooth® (thanks to the ESP32 microcontroller on board), and low-power consumption.
The perfect solution for smart homes and industry 4.0. The 800 x 480 resolution provides crisp and clear colors, while the screen is driven by the powerful BT815 graphics controller.

Furthermore, the display is Python programmable and has a Zerynth Studio license onboard. You can simply take it out of the box, load one of many examples from the Zerynth library, and have you IoT display up and running. And if you decide to write the code from scratch, with Python, you’ll be done in no time.
RiTFT-50-IOT-UX can be programmed in Python, thanks to Zerynth. Python is an easy to learn, easy to use, interpreted language, that suits fast-paced IoT projects this display is intended for.

Zerynth offers tons of useful libraries and examples – for every knowledge level. For example, one of their tutorials teaches how to connect a device to the Cloud, with only 15 lines of code in Python. With it, you’ll be sending temperature data from a sensor to the Cloud in minutes.
Riverdi IoT Display 5" Capacitive BT815 uxTouch (Black)
Provides 800 x 480 resolution for crisp and clear colors
Uses the powerful BT815 graphics controller
Is perfect for smart homes and industry 4.0
Is Python programmable, with integrated WiFi and Bluetooth

highlight.1: 84 tooth, 32 pitch hub gear mates to the included 20 tooth 6mm bore pinion gear
highlight.3: Hollow shaft allows wires to pass through the center of the pan system
highlight.4: Plate at the base of the pan system can easily be mounted to a flat surface

description: The Gear Drive Pan Kit A is includes all the parts necessary to build a compact gear driven pan system for a 37mm OD spur gearmotor (gearmotor not included).

The pan system utilizes an 84 tooth, 32 pitch hub gear which gets mated to the included 20 tooth 6mm bore pinion gear to create a 4.2:1 underdrive setup. The ratio slows the speed of the motor down while increasing the low-speed characteristics and torque.
4.2:1 underdrive setup
84 tooth, 32 pitch hub gear mates to the included 20 tooth 6mm bore pinion gear
Gear mesh is fully adjustable
Hollow shaft allows wires to pass through the center of the pan system
Plate at the base of the pan system can easily be mounted to a flat surface

description: The SparkFun Qwiic Adapter will help you make any old I2C board into a Qwiic-enabled board. This adapter breaks out the I2C pins from the Qwiic connectors to pins that you can easily solder with your favorite I2C-enabled device.

The Qwiic Adapter has two Qwiic connection ports, all on the same I2C bus. Four plated through holes are broken out for SCL, SDA, 3.3V and GND. These pins can be used to convert an old I2C-enabled device into a Qwiic-enabled board.

description: The Grove Mech Keycap is a mechanical switch with a build-in LED. The 255 full color RGB LED makes it simple and easy to show the states of your switch. This keycap is very reliable with 20,000,000 times press operating life. You will find that this is an interesting and stable module to make some really fun project or product. highlight.1: Color: Blue
highlight.2: The dual motors power triangular tracks and left/right arms in unison
highlight.3: Different assembly patterns create 2 different types of motion
highlight.4: Includes everything needed for easy snap-fit/screw-together assembly

description: The Tamiya CAM Programmable Robot (Blue) assembly kit creates a robot whose movement can be programmed by the use of cam parts. The dual motors power triangular tracks and left/right arms in unison.

Cams are inserted into the central program bar, and as it is pushed through the model by the program bar gear, the position of the cams is translated to the steering legs, which are lifted off the surface and cause the robot's motion to change.

Different assembly patterns create two different types of motion. Program bars give approximately 35 seconds of movement each, and can be joined together for longer patterns. Includes everything needed for easy snap-fit/screw-together assembly. Requires one R6/AA/UM3 battery (sold separately).

Cams are translated into movement as they push down the steering legs on either side, which raises that side's track off the ground. The model offers 2 different types of movement: the first (Type A) has the robot move forward when no cam is present, turn in that direction when there is a cam on one side only, and stop when there are cams on both sides.
Tamiya CAM Programmable Robot
Color: Blue
The dual motors power triangular tracks and left/right arms in unison
Different assembly patterns create 2 different types of motion
Includes everything needed for easy snap-fit/screw-together assembly

highlight.1: Has a magnetic core and a rotation impeller
highlight.2: The hall-effect sensor outputs the corresponding pulse signals
highlight.3: Detects flow in water dispenser or coffee machine

description: The Elecrow 1/2-In Water Flow Sensor consists of a magnetic core, rotating impeller, external casing and sensor, and a hall-effect sensor.

When water flows through the rotor, rotor rolls, it activates the magnetic core to trigger switch action speed changes with different rate of flow. The hall-effect sensor outputs the corresponding pulse signals, users can get the flow speed via detecting the pulse. It is suitable to detect flow in water dispenser or coffee machine.
Elecrow 1/2-In Water Flow Sensor
Has a magnetic core and a rotation impeller
The hall-effect sensor outputs the corresponding pulse signals
Detects flow in water dispenser or coffee machine

highlight.0: Industrial Shields M-DUINO PLC Arduino Ethernet 38R I/O Relay PLUS
highlight.1: Features 12 Inputs and 22 Outputs
highlight.2: Offers a full/half duplex RS485 port and a µSD Socket
highlight.3: Works directly with an SD memory card

description: This is the Industrial Shields M-DUINO PLC Arduino Ethernet 38R I/O Relay PLUS technology designed for professional use. This PLC has 34I/Os.

It also contains several communication ports which provide more flexibility and control. The M-DUINO family offers the possibility to expand up to 127 modules through I2C, which means that you can have until 7100 Inputs / Outputs in Master-Slave connections, additionally to sensors, etc. Can possibly be used with MODBUS RTU using the RS485 port working as a hardware Serial.
This PLC can be programmed using the Arduino IDE platform. The PLC M-DUINO is programmed through the USB ports. This PLC can also be programmed through Ethernet port remotely.

This offers immediate access to the program, maintain and control. Also, you can continuously monitor the status for all the variables, inputs, outputs, etc. It is compatible with the Ardbox PLC Range and the Touchberry Pi with an instantaneous connection.
Industrial Shields M-DUINO PLC Arduino Ethernet 38R I/O Relay PLUS
Features 12 Inputs and 22 Outputs
Offers a full/half duplex RS485 port and a µSD Socket
Works directly with an SD memory card

description: Build and program your own robot with the ALLBOT Programmable Four Legged Robot. The Velleman ALLBOT modular robots are compatible with your Arduino Uno  or Mega boards .

The ALLBOT Programmable Four Legged Robot comes with a servo motor connector shield, battery shield, plastic parts, 8 servo motors, VR001 (infrared transmitter) and hardware. The manual provides all the information you need for building your ALLBOT and gets you started programming it too. You can program your ALLBOT to be independent or control it through infrared using the free app. The servo motor connector shield has an on board IR receiver and the VR001 plugs into the audio port of your smartphone or tablet. The app is free and available for either Android or iOS.

category.6: Proximity Sensor EOPD (compatible with Lego Mindstorms NXT)

https://www.robotshop.com/en/proximity-s.product: Proximity Sensor EOPD (compatible with Lego Mindstorms NXT)

highlight.1: Generates and uses its own internal light source
highlight.2: Accurately detect objects and small changes in distance to a target
highlight.3: Two modes of operation, x1 sensitivity and x4 sensitivity
highlight.4: RobotShop is not affiliated with and this product and is not endorsed by LEGO

description: The Proximity Sensor EOPD (compatible with Lego Mindstorms NXT) accurately detects objects and small changes in distance to a target with the HiTechnic EOPD. The EOPD or Electro Optical Proximity Detector uses an internal light source to detect the presence of a target or determine changes in distance to a target. By generating its own light source, the EOPD is able to filter out all external light signals so as a robot moves from bright areas to dimmly lit areas or through shadows, the EOPD automatically compensates and only returns a signal based on its own light source. Targets can be accurately detected over distances up to about 8 inches (20 cm), depending on the target size, shape and reflective qualities.
Electro-Optical Proximity Detector (EOPD)
Generates and uses its own internal light source
Accurately detect objects and small changes in distance to a target
Two modes of operation, x1 sensitivity and x4 sensitivity
RobotShop is not affiliated with and this product and is not endorsed by LEGO
